channel.title: Decrypt
channel.description: What's new in crypto and the advent of the decentralized web.

item.title: Why Isn’t Sam Bankman-Fried Behind Bars Yet?
item.description: Spoiler alert: it hasn’t yet been determined whether he did anything criminal.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: GameStop Cuts More Staff—Including Crypto Wallet Engineers
item.description: Former employees say they were laid off from the gaming retail giant today, including engineers focused on its crypto efforts.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: U.S. Rep. Maxine Waters Insists SBF Attend FTX Hearing on Capitol Hill
item.description: The ranking member of the House Financial Services Committee tells the embattled ex-CEO that skipping out not an option.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: Nexo to Phase Out Service in US After Hitting 'Dead End' With Regulators
item.description: The U.K. crypto lender said it would suspend access to its Earn product in eight states from tomorrow.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: DeFi Lender Maple Finance Cuts Off Orthogonal Trading for 'Misrepresenting Its Financial Position'
item.description: After allegedly misrepresenting its finances to a lender on Maple Finance, the credit platform has cut all ties with Orthogonal Trading.
item.dc:creator: Liam J. Kelly

item.title: Aave Companies Acquires Social Metaverse Developer Sonar
item.description: The acquisition will see Sonar integrate Aave’s Lens protocol to introduce decentralized account profiles for its social mobile metaverse app.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Asmakov

item.title: Circle, SPAC Call Off Plan to Take USDC Issuer Public
item.description: The mutual termination comes after over a year and a half of deliberating around the terms of Circle’s potential multibillion-dollar listing.
item.dc:creator: Will McCurdy

item.title: Former IRS Agents at Binance Seek to Keep Crypto Crime-Free
item.description: The world’s biggest exchange has recruited top talent from law enforcement to take on cryptocurrency criminals.
item.dc:creator: Decrypt Staff

item.title: Bitcoin Could Drop to $5,000 in 2023 ‘Surprise’: Standard Chartered
item.description: Biden gets impeached, food prices collapse, and Bitcoin hits $5,000 all made Standard Chartered’s list of surprises for next year.
item.dc:creator: Alys Key

item.title: Bybit, Swyftx Join List of Crypto Firms Reducing Workforce
item.description: Two more crypto exchanges, Bybit and Swyftx, join the long list of companies to announce headcount reductions as crypto winter bites harder.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Asmakov

item.title: Axie Infinity Leads Metaverse, NFT Token Rally as Trade Volumes Surge
item.description: Amid a wider crypto market recovery, metaverse and NFT-related tokens in Apecoin, AXS, Sandbox, and others are benefitting the most.
item.dc:creator: Sujith Somraaj

item.title: Many DAOs and Web3 Projects Are ‘Decentralization Theater’: Tezos Co-Founder
item.description: Kathleen Breitman says a focus on decentralization is critical to achieving longevity in Web3.
item.dc:creator: André Beganski

item.title: SBF Publicly Punts on U.S. House Hearing Invitation
item.description: Lawmakers wanted the disgraced cryptocurrency exchange founder to testify about the collapse of FTX.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: TIMEX Launches $2,500 Bored Ape Watches and Matching NFTs
item.description: The luxury watchmaker unveiled a line of 500 one-of-one customizable timepieces.
item.dc:creator: André Beganski

item.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Sam Bankman-Fried Won't Stop Talking, Coinbase Challenges Apple
item.description: Also, the Caribbean island of Dominica is issuing the “world’s first national coin,” entitling holders to Dominican passports.
item.dc:creator: Tim Hakki

item.title: Coinbase CEO Rejects FTX ‘Accounting Error,’ Says Funds Were Obviously ‘Stolen’
item.description: Brian Armstrong says only the “most gullible person” would believe an $8 billion hole was due to lackluster accounting.
item.dc:creator: André Beganski

item.title: Genesis Owes Gemini Earn Users $900M: Report
item.description: Gemini has yet to reopen withdrawals for users of its Earn service due to crypto market contagion from FTX.
item.dc:creator: Will McCurdy

item.title: This Week in Coins: Twitter Speculation Sends Dogecoin Higher, Bitcoin and Ethereum See Green
item.description: ETH rose nicely even as the FTX drama continues. Brazilian lawmakers also took a significant step towards regulating cryptocurrencies.
item.dc:creator: Tim Hakki

item.title: Let’s Dispel Some Misconceptions About Wrapped Bitcoin and Ethereum
item.description: This week saw misinformation on Twitter about potential "insolvency" of WETH. None of that was accurate. Here's how wrapped coins work.
item.dc:creator: Liam J. Kelly

item.title: How to Move Bitcoin, Ethereum and Other Crypto to Self-Custody
item.description: Worried about your Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other crypto being trapped on a centralized exchange like FTX? Here's how to change that.
item.dc:creator: Alyssa Hertig

item.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads
item.description: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business—plus misconceptions in the crypto space.

item.title: Three Arrows Liquidators Seize $35M, Seek $30M More for 'Much Wow' Superyacht
item.description: But the bust firm’s co-founders still aren’t cooperating, a Friday document shows.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Coinbase Pauses Plans for Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Short Film Trilogy
item.description: The “Degen Trilogy” series is on hold, the company confirmed to Decrypt, months after the widely panned first entry was released.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: MetaMask Co-Founder Wants to 'Dump' Apple, Calls iOS Purchase Tax 'Abuse'
item.description: MetaMask’s co-founder and co-lead developer Dan Finlay says he’s prepared to take a stand against Apple in solidarity with Coinbase Wallet.
item.dc:creator: Kate Irwin

item.title: Maxine Waters Thanks SBF for Being 'Candid' About FTX Collapse
item.description: The lawmaker has invited Bankman-Fried to testify before the House Financial Services Committee this month.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Yahoo to Offer Retail Stock Trading—Is Crypto Next?
item.description: Sources have told Decrypt that Apollo wants to offer retail crypto trading on Yahoo Finance.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson,Daniel Roberts

item.title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2022
item.description: 'Tis the season to be jolly—spread some festive cheer with our guide to the best holiday crypto gifts for all budgets.
item.dc:creator: Decrypt Staff

item.title: Galaxy Digital Wins Celsius Bankruptcy Auction to Acquire Crypto Custodian GK8
item.description: GK8, one of the assets put up for auction during Celsius’ bankruptcy proceedings, will play a role in Galaxy Digital’s institutional offering.
item.dc:creator: Liam J. Kelly

item.title: Australian Stock Exchange Fires 200 Contractors Working on Canceled Blockchain Project
item.description: Shortly after axing its blockchain project, the Australian Securities Exchange has now laid off 200 contractors working on the project.
item.dc:creator: Will McCurdy

item.title: Korean Prosecutors Seek Arrest of Terra Co-Founder Over $105M LUNA Sale
item.description: Daniel Shin attended a court hearing over whether he should be arrested for allegedly extracting illegal profits prior to Terra's collapse.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Graves

item.title: Binance Pauses Withdrawals Amid $5M Ankr 'Infinite Mint' Hack
item.description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao announced that the exchange had paused withdrawals following an exploit on the crypto node project Ankr.
item.dc:creator: Liam J. Kelly

item.title: DOJ Watchdog Seeks Independent Examiner of FTX Collapse
item.description: The internal agency compares the failure of FTX to that of Lehman Brothers and New Century Financial.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: Three Arrows Founders Have One Week to Provide Key Financial Documents: Singapore Court
item.description: The documents would help liquidators locate funds and settle claims with the creditors of the bankrupt hedge fund.
item.dc:creator: Stacy Elliott

item.title: Solana Soars, Flow Falls as NFT Market Declines Further in November
item.description: Trading in November is about 88% lower than January as overall volume and total NFTs sold both slump even further.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: Politicians Are Giving Back Their Donations From Disgraced FTX Founder
item.description: Among the politicians who haven't commented on their SBF donations: Sens. Boozman and Stabenow, who co-sponsored the DCCPA bill.
item.dc:creator: Stacy Elliott

item.title: The Inaugural Crypties Awards: In Pictures!
item.description: Crypto's leading lights gathered for the inaugural Crypties Awards at Art Basel Miami. Check out the winners and the highlights.
item.dc:creator: Decrypt Staff

item.title: Apple Forces Coinbase to Disable NFT Transfers on Its Wallet App
item.description: Apple has begun enforcing its 30% tax on NFT transactions, and Coinbase isn’t happy.
item.dc:creator: Kate Irwin

item.title: CFTC Chair: Crypto 'Potentially a Threat to National Security' After FTX Crash
item.description: CFTC Chairman Rostin Behnam told Senators today that his agency needs more power to regulate crypto following the collapse of FTX.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Magic Eden Launches Solana NFT Tool to Enforce Creator Royalties
item.description: The Open Creator Protocol lets creators of new NFT collections block marketplaces that refuse to honor royalties on OCP-enabled assets.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: Crown Ribbon is Shaking Up the $300B Horse Racing Industry With NFTs
item.description: The fully-regulated NFT platform lets users buy NFT shares of a racehorse syndicate that maps to one horse, or a collection of horses.
item.dc:creator: Decrypt Staff

item.title: KuCoin Draws Ire for Sky-High Yields on Bitcoin Dual Investment Earn Products
item.description: The KuCoin Earn page has been advertising APRs of 233.15% on Ethereum, 253.28% on Bitcoin, and 100% on Tether deposits.
item.dc:creator: Stacy Elliott

item.title: Fintech Lawyer: Crypto Companies Need to Seek Legal Advice Before Launch
item.description: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.

item.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads
item.description: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he’s looking forward to in Web3.

item.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022
item.description: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.

item.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022
item.description: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.

item.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022
item.description: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.

item.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'
item.description: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.

item.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next
item.description: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

item.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin
item.description: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.

item.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?
item.description: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

item.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022
item.description: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Reza Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.

item.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market
item.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.

item.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough
item.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.

item.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022
item.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.

item.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
item.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

item.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces
item.description: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a metaverse."

item.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
item.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

item.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap
item.description: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.

item.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
item.description: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.

item.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko
item.description: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
